description: This file defines the TextKnowledgeBase class, which manages loading and processing text documents from files or directories, with support for asynchronous operations and metadata handling.

classes.name: TextKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages loading, reading, and processing text documents, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations, with flexible path and metadata handling.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Iterates over text files and yields lists of Document objects, handling both single paths and lists with optional metadata.

methods.name: _is_valid_text
methods.description: Checks if a given path points to a valid text file based on existence, file type, and suffix.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronously iterates over text files and yields lists of Document objects, supporting both single paths and lists with optional metadata.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads documents from a specified file path into the vector database, with optional metadata and control flags.

methods.name: aload_document
methods.description: Asynchronously loads documents from a specified file path into the vector database, with optional metadata and control flags.
